abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Improve Education
            Quality Project is to increase access and equity and enhance
            quality of the teaching and learning environment in basic
            education. In the last year the Government has significantly
            accelerated program implementation though: (i) addressing
            capacity constrains in planning and procurement; and (ii)
            use of more effective implementation mechanisms. This
            includes adding additional mechanism for school
            infrastructure, decentralizing the procurement of learning
            materials, and increased funding directly schools. The
            Government of Malawi has an action plan to complete the
            program that is acceptable to International Development
            Association (IDA). This will be the first extension of the project.
